description: This header file declares the LocalStore class which implements the ILocalStore interface. It provides methods for database operations such as opening a database, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It appears to be part of a larger framework involving database interactions within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: A class that manages local storage using SQLite, implementing the ILocalStore interface with methods for database management and data manipulation.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the database connection with the specified file path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the database.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a range in a table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Fetches entries from a table starting from a specified index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a table.
